name: Qliphot
description:
Hi! And thank you for checking out Qliphot!

Qliphot is an Action-Adventure RPG much like the top-down Zelda games I grew up loving. I've added a bit a more modern, PC-based control scheme, where the character attacks and looks at your Mouse Pointer, while moving with WASD. 

A word of caution, and probably of bit of self-excusing: This project is in its very early stages. I am a Game Designer at heart, so visual assets are mostly things I bought in Unity's Asset store, there's no save yet, and some sounds and graphics I borrowed from games to illustrate. I will work on replacing these very soon (All games are properly credited).

However, I want to hear from you: What you think about it, what you don't like, what you imagine I could do with the systems... All feedback more than welcome!

Thank you so much for playing!

All music made by Winterquilt, a friend and extremely talented musician who encouraged me to upload this demo with his support and enthusiasm for the project!
